title: Mappings
brief_description: Develops a concept of the interchangeability of the words ‘function’ and ‘mapping’. Shows a ‘function machine’ which responds predictably to a given numerical stimulus and gives the rule underlying the response. Good use of comical sketches to explain mathematical equations. From the series “Vision in mathematics”.
